message: Accept my generous offer and we can call it a day!
Let's split it down the middle and be done with it!
I'm not sure splitting it down the middle is the best idea. I'll think of something better.
I'll give you a bit less, but I think this is a fair offer. Don't wait too long, though!
I'll give you a slightly larger share, but I'm not getting taken advantage of!
You're trying to get the better deal, but I'm not giving up yet!
I'm willing to give you a bit less, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of either!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not getting too generous!
You're still not giving me enough. I'll think of something better.
I'm not going to wait any longer. Take it or leave it!
I'll give you a small share, but I'm not giving up yet!
You're not giving me enough. I'll keep pushing for more.
This is my final offer. Take it or leave it, but I'm not going to give you a better deal!
I'll take a small share, but I'm not going to let you walk away with everything!
You're getting close to the end, but I'm not going to give you the majority. I'll think of something else.
This is my last offer. I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of.
It's now or never, Alice. I'm taking what I can get.
I suppose I'll take what I can get. It's better than leaving with nothing.
